content: make a coffee cuff six different ways instructions are included for cabled cuffs in fingering dk and worsted weight yarn and for plain ribbed cuffs in fingering dk and worsted weight each cuff only takes a little yarn so you can use your stash to make easy fun gifts and help the environment too this pattern has been used as a fundraiser for the great plains food bank in fargo nd you are welcome to use the pattern to teach classes if you do i would appreciate it if you would make a small donation to your local food bank if you re able to
